name: Monster Friends Forever
description:
Monster Friends Are here and they need your help

DASH as fast as you can!
DODGE the oncoming trains!

Help your monster fiend, Tricky & Fresh escape from the wild cats.

- Grind trains with your cool crew!
- Many cool Fiends to choose from
- Colorful and vivid HD graphics!
- Hoverboard Surfing!
- Paint powered jetpack!
- Lightning fast swipe acrobatics!
- Leaderboards

Super Monster Run

Presented by Gamebread
